author: Mariah Blah
text: 'Food is great. Two stars for poor customer service and attitude from man in charge of expediting. I ordered 1 bagel at 10:48 exactly. I literally work down the block about 3 stores away IN A RESTAURANT. I order every weekend so I completely understand how busy they are. I never complain. I returned exactly 3 times after receiving a 35 minute wait time ( ordered online ). Unfortunately I had to work at 12pm. I returned at 11:15
column5: 11:30 and 11:45. It still was not ready. Finally after clocking in
column6:
I was able to get a quick break to run and pick it up.

Not only does the man tell me he threw away my bagel but then continues to argue with me after I explained that I had already returned 3 times. My coworker ordered at 11:45. The final time I returned to pick up all three bagels. Their two bagels were ready while mine was thrown out. Instead of comping my bagel and remaking it . He tells me to pay for it and he would deliver it very rudely. You just lost a customer for a $6 bagel for your rudeness and horrible customer service.

Sucks when you work in the restaurant industry and are one of the most understanding customers
column7: we always get the short end of the stick. We will no longer be ordering from here.'

author: Andy Park
text: 'First
column5: dont focus only on taking orders and having customer pay.  My order sat on counter for 5min because counter was busy taking orders and making customers oay first.  Not only that

text: 'Having tried countless amounts of bagel places as I think of it as of niche and evaporate to go food multiple times a day and travel on the road all through north jersey I am now located in Hudson county and figured I‚Äôd give this place a try highest rated bagel spot in Hoboken and boy was I so disappointed. Home fries were just huge chunks of semi raw potatoes. For 11$ for the sandwich and home fries would much rather go to 8/11 or Dunkin‚Äô Donuts the sandwiches  are very similar. Will never be back.'

column6:
it‚Äôs not like if they were going to remember but whatever.

text: "Absolutely LOVE this place! The staff is super friendly and quick. I've never had to wait more than 10 minutes for anything

column7: a variety of wraps with an assortment of tortilla shells
column8: and a well stocked deli for sandwiches. They also offer a good variety of smoothies and specialty drinks to be had. This is an outstanding breakfast and quick lunch spit. Not much in the way of seating
column9: but the Riverside park is only a couple blocks away so that makes for a nice picnic/outdoor lunch respite. And the prices are very reasonable considering the quality and turn around. This is definitely a place worth the stop!"

Came back to ask for remake and the cashier had the audacity to try and show me the one slice of avocado and say I was okay charging me 2 dollars for it she also said  i didn‚Äôt specify whether I wanted poppy seeds or not when I did by SAYING PLAIN ROLL. She had way too much attitude
column9: overcharged for a sandwich I went and got down the block for 5 dollars that was better and actually filled with the vegetables I asked and paid for. Will not be returning and letting all of my friends to avoid this place.'

author: Jachai DeJesus
text: "a black russian with avocado
column5: lettuce
column6: & tomato. The simple bagels are always the best! JP's will hook you all the way up!"

author: Mike Reid
text: 'Taylor ham
column5: egg
column6: and cheese on an everything bagel'

author: Thomas Kielich
text: 'Great bagels and breakfast sandwiches. The staff is usually super friendly and quick to get your order out. All in all
column5: no complaints!'
